column5: WWR Chinese producer has been increasing its dominance in the lithium space all over the World In April the company announced a US160 million investment in Lithium Americas NYSELACTSXLAC Cauchari Olaroz project in Argentina increasing its stake from 375 percent to 50 percent With interests in six lithium resources in Australia Argentina China and Ireland and its primary source of lithium raw materials at Mount Marion in Western Australia Ganfeng Lithium has also signed lithium supply agreements with carmakers and battery manufacturers around the world investingnewscomdailyres
